application.doc: Retrieving a list of firmware settings

method.name: GET
method.doc: To retrieve the current list of firmware settings with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the firmware settings URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

200 OK Content-Type:application/json [ { "id":1, "active":true, "partition":"1 (Active)", "name":"isva_10.0.0.0_20200612-0420", "comment":"Active partition", "firmware_version":"IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0.0", "install_date":"1591935600", "install_type":"ISO", "last_boot":"1591935600", "backup_date":null }, { "id":2, "active":false, "partition":"2", "name":"isva_10.0.0.0_20200612-0420", "comment":"Backup partition", "firmware_version":"IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0.0", "install_date":"1591935600", "install_type":"Backup", "last_boot":"1591935600", "backup_date":"1591935600" } ]

param.name: active
param.doc: Whether or not this partition is the active partition

param.name: partition
param.doc: A string representation including both id and active

param.name: comment
param.doc: The comment attached to the partition

param.name: firmware_version
param.doc: The current version of the firmware on the partition, in the format "%PRODUCT NAME% %VERSION%".

param.name: install_date
param.doc: The date the firmware was installed. In seconds since epoch

param.name: install_type
param.doc: The type of the firmware installation

param.name: last_boot
param.doc: The date the partition was last booted. In seconds since epoch

param.name: backup_date
param.doc: The date the active partition was backed up. In seconds since epoch. This in only valid for the backup partition.
